Text: InformationDocument Request pst As you may know for the past several months the Response and Production RAP Team has been collecting documents responsive to numerous government and Congressional requests In connection with that effort we must identify all individuals who were responsible for matters at Enron related to the following agencies between the dates of January to December other than publicly available periodic filings required by law a Executive Office of the President b US Securities and Exchange Commission c US Commodity Futures Trading Commission d US Federal Energy Regulatory Commission e US Department of Labor f US Department of Commerce g US Department of Energy h Overseas Private Investment Corporation i ExportImport Bank of the United States This request should be accorded high priority and given immediate attention Please respond promptly to the undersigned by email or telephone Thank you in advance for your cooperation Michelle Hicks Juli FordLasseter

InformationDocument Request pst As you may know for the past several months the Response and Production RAP Team has been collecting documents responsive to numerous government and Congressional requests In connection with that effort we must identify all offices and departments likely to have documents relevant to communications between Enron and the following federal agencies between the dates of January to December other than publicly available periodic filings required by law a Executive Office of the President b US Securities and Exchange Commission c US Commodity Futures Trading Commission d US Federal Energy Regulatory Commission e US Department of Labor f US Department of Commerce g US Department of Energy h Overseas Private Investment Corporation i ExportImport Bank of the United States In addition to the above listed agencies please identify all current andor former Enron personnel who may have had contact with any US government official This request should be accorded high priority and given immediate attention Please respond promptly to the undersigned by email or telephone Thank you in advance for your cooperation Michelle Hicks Juli FordLasseter

InformationDocument Request pst As you may know for the past several months the Response and Production RAP Team has been collecting documents responsive to numerous government and Congressional requests In connection with that effort we must identify all current andor former Enron personnel who may have had contact with any official employee or representative of any of the following federal agencies between the dates of January to December other than publicly available periodic filings required by law a Executive Office of the President b US Securities and Exchange Commission c US Commodity Futures Trading Commission d US Federal Energy Regulatory Commission e US Department of Labor f US Department of Commerce g US Department of Energy h Overseas Private Investment Corporation i ExportImport Bank of the United States In addition to the above listed agencies please identify all current andor former Enron personnel who may have had contact with any US government official This request should be accorded high priority and given immediate attention Please respond promptly to the undersigned by email or telephone Thank you in advance for your cooperation Michelle Hicks mailto Juli FordLasseter mailto
